alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:50PM EDT until May 15 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHEMUNG AND SOUTHWESTERN TIOGA COUNTIES... At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lockwood, or 8 miles north of Waverly, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Barton, Owego, Nichols, Lockwood, Tioga Center, Lounsberry, Owens Mill and Catatonk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
